revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Gigabyte |model=GN-MD01 |revision=(rev. 1.0) |asin=B004ZC7B6A;DE; |manuf_country=Taiwan |is_manuf=Yes |availability= |type=access point |fcc_date=06/29/2005 |fcc_id=JCK-GN-MD01 |pcb_id= |pwr_v=7.5 |pwr_amp=0.8 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=RDC |cpu1_model=R2600 |cpu1_cspeed=100 |fla1=1 |fla1_brand=SST |fla1_model=SST39VF800A |ram1=8 |ram1_brand=ICSI |ram1_model=IC42S16400-7T |expansion_if_types= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_chip1_brand=RDC |wi1_chip1_model=R2600 |wi1_chip2_brand=Ralink |wi1_chip2_model=RT2525L |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bg |wi1_ant_conn=RP-SMA |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=IC+ |eth_chip2_model=IP101 |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |addl_chips=Serial EEPROM;Atmel;AT93C46;;1; |flags=schematics |802dot11_protocols=bg |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user= |default_pass= |oui= |oui_eth= }} {{TagLine|AirCruiser G Game Adapter}} :''Wireless Game Adapter'' {{•}} [https://www.gigabyte.com/Wireless-Product/GN-MD01-rev-10 Product page] {{•}} [http://download.gigabyte.us/FileList/EBrochure/comm_comm_ebrochure_p3p4.pdf PBrief] {{•}} [http://www.gamesindustry.biz/articles/gigabyte-brings-wireless-to-game-consoles Press release]
The ''Gigabyte'' logo, "Gigabyte GC-M1G1", "REV: 1.0", and :"PCB MADE IN TAIWAN" is silkscreened on the board.
The power adapter included with the device is a ''OEM'' :AD-0780 120VAC/60Hz 13W (7.5V, 0.8A).
*[https://elektrotanya.com/gigabyte_gn-md01_rev_1.0_sch.pdf/download.html Schematics]
